```{r}
library(mdsr)
library(RMySQL)
db <- dbConnect_scidb(dbname = "imdb")
```

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)
library(dbplyr)
```

```{r}
this_big_thing <- db %>%
dbGetQuery("SELECT mi.info, 
t.title, t.production_year, t.id
FROM title t
JOIN movie_info mi ON t.id = mi.movie_id
WHERE mi.info_type_id = 3
AND t.kind_id = 1;")
```

```{r}
movie_genre <- this_big_thing %>%
  group_by(info) %>%
  summarise(n_obvs = n())
```

```{r}
title_genre <- this_big_thing %>%
  group_by(production_year, id) %>%
  summarise(genres_observed = n()) %>%
  filter(production_year < 2018)
```

```{r}
genre_count_pre_1947 <- this_big_thing %>%
  group_by(production_year, id) %>%
  summarise(genres_observed = n()) %>%
  filter(production_year < 1947)
```

```{r}
genre_count_post_1947 <- this_big_thing %>%
  group_by(production_year, id) %>%
  summarise(genres_observed = n()) %>%
  filter(production_year > 1946)
```
